doc.field: Series XIII: Collected Film and Audio Library
Series XIII: Collected Film and Audio Library
Communist Party of the United States of America Records
Communist Party of the United States of America Records

Videos in this subseries contain an assortment of recorded events, speeches, documentaries, and television programs collected by the Communist Party. Tapes include commercially produced VHS tapes, recordings of events in which the Communist Party was interested but not directly involved, and items whose content cannot be determined by their current labels. The content of these tapes touches on a variety of issues related to labor activism and demonstrations in the United States and social issues in Africa, Latin America, Korea, and Cuba. Titles of tapes are derived from annotations on cassettes, which in many cases are unclear. These tapes have not been preservered and may be rearranged into Series XI: Broadcasts and Public Events after materials have been digitized.

Some tapes may contain off-air content, but this content cannot be identified until videos are selected for playback. Off-air materials cannot be preserved because of copyright concerns, and will be deaccessioned when identified.
